text:
@narendramodi @smritiirani In wake of the current scenario where people are struggling with deprivation, fear and loss due to the COVID 19 virus I have decided to join forces with humanity for a Global Prayer to Eradicate the COVID-19 virus. 
https://t.co/sl4mvFIOza

#OneWorldOneFamily

#EradicateCOVID19 https://t.co/wq54QRfTzA
